column4: hey guys, i'm having a consistant problem with dvdrip/libdvdcss2 -- When I "read DVD contents" it only probes the first title on the disc and errors on the second one, then stops "Can't open the title 2 info file"
this has been on 3 DVDs now.....and seems to work fine on DVDShrink DVDs
try dmesg; u might find the error there
dmesg has some ambiguous lines in there about it no errors per se
